text: Consider the Lilies is a novel by Iain Crichton Smith first published in 1968. The book is set in the context of the Highland Clearances and follows an elderly woman who is suffering a religious crisis. In 2013 the book was named 7th on a list of the 50 best Scottish books of the last 50 years by the Scottish Book Trust.Scottish Book Trust - 50 Best Books ==References== Category:Scottish novels
